#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <list>
#include <algorithm>
#include <set>
#include <utility>
#include <queue>
#include <cstring>
#include <sstream>

#define SIZE 41

using namespace std;
typedef long long LLD;
typedef pair<int, int> Node;
int n, m;

int main()
{
	int t, tc, i, j, k, x, y;
	//freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	//freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
	
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	
	for(int t = 1; t <= tc; t++) {
		priority_queue <long long, vector<long long>, greater<long long> > q;
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);
		
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &x);
			q.push(x);
		}
		
		long long ans = 0;
		long long temp = 0;
		
		int mod = (k - 1) - ((n - 1) % (k - 1));
		if (k - 1 == mod)
			mod = 0;
		//printf("%d %d : %d\n", n, k, mod);
		
		while(mod--)
			q.push(0LL);
			
		while(q.size() > 1) {
			temp = 0;
			int cnt = min(k, (int)q.size());
			for(i = 0; i < cnt; i++) {
				temp += q.top();
				q.pop();
			}
			ans += temp;
			q.push(temp);
		}
		printf("Case %d: %lld\n", t, ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
